<h2>Register for the 2025 SUSAN Conference</h2>

<!-- The button to display the form -->
<button id="showFormButton" onclick="showForm()">Register Here</button>

<!-- The form, hidden by default, with increased width -->
<form id="registerForm" name="contact" method="POST" data-netlify="true" action="/thank-you" style="display: none; margin-top: 20px; width: 80%;">
  <p>
    <label>Name: 
      <input type="text" name="name" required style="width: 200%; padding: 10px; font-size: 16px;" />
    </label>
  </p>
  <p>
    <label>Email: 
      <input type="email" name="email" required style="width: 200%; padding: 10px; font-size: 16px;" />
    </label>
  </p>
  <p>
    <label>Institution: 
      <input type="text" name="institution" required style="width: 200%; padding: 10px; font-size: 16px;" />
    </label>
  </p>
  <p>
    <button type="submit">Register</button>
  </p>
</form>

<!-- JavaScript to toggle form visibility -->
<script>
  function showForm() {
    var form = document.getElementById("registerForm");
    var button = document.getElementById("showFormButton");

    // Show the form and hide the button
    form.style.display = "block";
    button.style.display = "none";
  }
</script>
